main: // include: vector
// namespace: std
&empty-line;
void bubbleSort(vector<int>& array) {
&tab1;for (int i = 0; i < array.size() - 1; i++)
&tab2;for (int j = 0; j < array.size() - i - 1; j++)
&tab3;if (array[j] > array[j + 1])
&tab4;swap(array[j], array[j + 1]);
};

void selectionSort(vector<int>& array) {

main: const insertionSort = (array) => {

&tab2;let j = i,
&tab3;current = array[i];
&tab2;while (--j >= 0 && array[j] > current)
&tab3;array[j + 1] = array[j];
&tab2;array[j + 1] = current;
&tab1;}
};

main: // include: vector
// namespace: std
&empty-line;
void insertionSort(vector<int>& array) {
&tab1;for (int i = 1; i < array.size(); i++) {
&tab2;int j = i,
&tab3; current = array[i];
&tab2;while (--j >= 0 && array[j] > current)
&tab3;array[j + 1] = array[j];
&tab2;array[j + 1] = current;
&tab1;}
};

main: def insertionSort(array):
&tab1;for i in range(1, len(array)):
&tab2;j, current = i - 1, array[i]
&tab2;while j >= 0 and array[j] > current:
&tab3;array[j + 1] = array[j]
&tab3;j -= 1
&tab2;array[j + 1] = current

main: const quickSort = (array, left = 0, right = array.length - 1) => {
&tab1;if (left >= right) return;
&tab1;const pivot = array[Math.floor((left + right) / 2)];
&tab1;let i = left,
&tab2;j = right;
&tab1;while (i <= j) {
&tab2;while (array[i] < pivot) ++i;
&tab2;while (array[j] > pivot) --j;
&tab2;if (i <= j) {
&tab3;[array[i], array[j]] = [array[j], array[i]];
&tab3;++i;
&tab3;--j;
&tab2;}
&tab1;}
&tab1;quickSort(array, left, j);
&tab1;quickSort(array, i, right);
};
usage: const array = [5, 2, 4, 6, 1, 3, 7];
quickSort(array);

main: // include: vector
// namespace: std
&empty-line;
void quickSort(vector<int>& array, int left, int right) {
&tab1;if (left >= right) return;
&tab1;int pivot = array[(left + right) / 2],
&tab2;i = left,
&tab2;j = right;
&tab1;while (i <= j) {
&tab2;while (array[i] < pivot) ++i;
&tab2;while (array[j] > pivot) --j;
&tab2;if (i <= j)
&tab3;swap(array[i++], array[j--]);
&tab1;}
&tab1;quickSort(array, left, j);
&tab1;quickSort(array, i, right);
};
usage: vector<int> array = {5, 2, 4, 6, 1, 3, 7};
quickSort(array, 0, array.size() - 1);

main: def quickSort(array, left, right):
&tab1;if (left >= right):
&tab2;return
&tab1;pivot = array[int((left + right) / 2)]
&tab1;i, j = left, right
&tab1;while i <= j:
&tab2;while array[i] < pivot:
&tab3;i += 1
&tab2;while array[j] > pivot:
&tab3;j -= 1
&tab2;if i <= j:
&tab3;array[i], array[j] = array[j], array[i]
&tab3;i += 1
&tab3;j -= 1
&tab1;quickSort(array, left, j)
&tab1;quickSort(array, i, right)
usage: array = [5, 2, 4, 6, 1, 3, 7]
quickSort(array, 0, len(array) - 1)

main: // include: vector
// namespace: std
&empty-line;
void merge(vector<int>& array, int left, int middle, int right) {
&tab1;int leftSize = middle - left + 1;
&tab1;int rightSize = right - middle;
&tab1;vector<int> leftArray(leftSize);
&tab1;vector<int> rightArray(rightSize);
&tab1;for (int i = 0; i < leftSize; i++) leftArray[i] = array[left + i];
&tab1;for (int j = 0; j < rightSize; j++) rightArray[j] = array[middle + 1 + j];
&tab1;int i = 0, j = 0;
&tab1;int k = left;
&tab1;while (i < leftSize && j < rightSize)
&tab2;if (leftArray[i] <= rightArray[j]) array[k++] = leftArray[i++];
&tab2;else array[k++] = rightArray[j++];
&tab1;while (i < leftSize) array[k++] = leftArray[i++];
&tab1;while (j < rightSize) array[k++] = rightArray[j++];
}
&empty-line;
void mergeSort(vector<int>& array, int left, int right) {
&tab1;if (left >= right) return;
&tab1;int middle = (left + right) / 2;
&tab1;mergeSort(array, left, middle);
&tab1;mergeSort(array, middle + 1, right);
&tab1;merge(array, left, middle, right);
}
